page.title: 01PETERCULTER & MILLTIMBER.
page.content:
{ {LANDSCAPE Around Peterculter there are many forests owned by the Forestry Commission.The forests have nature trails and paths for the public's enjoyment.The land here is quite hilly so these trails can be tiring.In this area there are some hills e.g. Beans Hill in the North West and Hill of Milltimber.The surrounding land is used mainly for farming. { {RIVERS The River Dee runs through this area. The banks of the river have been built up recently to prevent winter flooding.If you wish to fish here you will need a permit, it is illegal to fish without one.
CONT.
